comments: Hans, do you know what version of the DS provider is being used here? I know that provider version 5.2 introduced incompatible changes. If we haven't adapted our code to support those changes, then in one sense this bug is to be expected. However, we need to support version 5.2, so we need to get those changes in!
The CIMOM level was CIMOMSWLVL=5.2.1.93. We need to make sure Aperi will support   CIMOM level above 5.2 in the future.  I lowered the Severity to be 3 (normal)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 169607 ***

traces.message: CIM_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER(Remote exception at the CIMOM:CIM_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER: One or more parameter values passed to the method were invalid: "CIM_PackagedComponent")
CIM_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER(Remote exception at the CIMOM:CIM_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER: One or more parameter values passed to the method were invalid: "CIM_PackagedComponent")
